name: Little Trouble in Big Neo York
name_original: Little Trouble in Big Neo York
description:
Play as the mysterious detective as you roam around the desolate run down suburbs of Neo-York city. Use your detective vision to alternate platforms and advance through the levels to solve the case of the missing robot!

Made for the 'Tangible Play' module at London South Bank University, a module based around accessibility. The game should be 100% completable with only one button press at a time and controls are remappable.

To be played in 1920 x 1080 resolution

CONTROLS (Default - remappable by pressing esc)

Left - A

Right - D

Jump - Space

Toggle Green/Blue Vision - E

Pause/Remap Controls - esc
